predicate.note: Frames file for 'peddle' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'sell'.

roleset.name: to sell or offer for sale

example.name: transitive
example.text: Boys on busy street corners peddle newspapers of every political stripe .

example.name: with Arg3
example.text: His daughter turns to dressmaking , then to [*] peddling herself for a few piasters .

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: Like many young recruits in Japanese securities firms , he began his career [*-1] peddling stock to individual investors .
